home_main_description:
At Bonzo, we transform learning with interactive games and competitions. 
Our solution challenges and motivates, equipping learners with essential 21st-century skills.
learn_today: Learn through fun games. Begin today!
change_grade_sure: Are you sure you want to change grade?
lost_earning: All earned coins will be lost
request_failed: The request couldn't be completed due to network instability. Please verify your internet connection and attempt again.
no_content: No content available. Please try again later.
play_fun_games: Play fun games, challenge friends and learn new skills!
empower: Empower your learners to compete and enhance their skills.

players_challenged_dec: All existing players have already been challenged. Invite more friends to join the fun!
payment_success_description: Your payment for playbonzo competitions is confirmed. Please go to My Competitions and track your players' progress.
subscription_detail: Unlock premium content and features today!
feature_main_description: We boost engagement and retention by integrating education with exciting, game-based competitions that enhance outcomes, drive measurable progress, and achieve impactful results.
feature_card_one_title: Dynamic Competitions – Micro Learning Through Games
feature_card_one_desc_one: Transform traditional learning with interactive games that build critical thinking & problem-solving skills.
feature_card_one_desc_two: Experience bite-sized micro-learning that keeps students engaged and motivated.
feature_card_two_title: Accessible Format – Customisable Features for Your Needs
feature_card_two_desc_one: Choose from our library of ready-made competitions or create custom experiences tailored to your goals.
feature_card_two_desc_two: Use our solution to enrich your educational or engagement initiatives.
feature_card_three_desc_one: Boost engagement with Branch’s customizable rewards, real-time leaderboards, and exclusive vouchers.
feature_card_three_desc_two: Use performance tracking analytics to create personalized learning paths.
who_use_it_main_description: Our innovative educational platform is designed to serve learners, principals, and organisational leaders by providing engaging, future-ready skills through learning games and competitions.
who_use_it_card_one_desc: Unlock your future-ready skills through gamified learning and competitions.
who_use_it_card_two_desc: Enhance your curricula with learning solutions that prepare students for future challenges.
who_use_it_card_three_desc: Equip your teams and customers with future-ready skills through engaging, competitive learning experiences.
enhance_learning_main_description: Our games and competitions enhance engagement and learning outcomes, delivering measurable returns for everyone.
personalised_desc: Tailored learning experiences for maximum engagement.
gamified_desc: Enjoy fun competitions with leaderboards and rewards.
adaptive_desc: Customised learning pathways to fit your needs.
bitesized_desc: Focused content for quick, effective learning.
contact_us_main_description: Contact us for more information about Bonzo. Our team is always available to provide assistance.
email_us_desc: Reach out for assistance via email:
call_us_desc: For immediate help, give us a call:
